#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy
== Chart Examples ==
==== Taken from the module unit tests ====
=== Line ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['helloWorld'])
G.axes.type('xy')
G.axes.label(0,'Mar','Apr','May','June','July')
G.axes.label(1,None,'50+Kb')
G.line(2,10,2)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chs=300x150&chd=s:helloWorld&chxl=0:|Mar|Apr|May|June|July|1:||50+Kb&cht=lc&chls=2.0,10.0,2.0&.png

=== Bar ===
{{{
G = GChart('bhg',['hell','orld'])
G.color('cc0000','00aa00')
G.bar(10,5,10)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=cc0000,00aa00&chd=s:hell,orld&chs=300x150&cht=bhg&chbh=10,5,10&.png

=== Pie ===
{{{
G = GChart('p3',[10,20,30,40])
G.label(*'ABCD')
G.color('00ff00')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=00ff00&chd=s:Pfu9&chs=300x150&cht=p3&chl=A|B|C|D&.png

=== Venn ===
{{{
G = GChart('v',['fooobaaar'])
G.color('ff0000','0000ff')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=ff0000,0000ff&chd=s:fooobaaar&chs=300x150&cht=v&.png

=== Axes ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['foobarbaz'])
G.color('76A4FB')
G.axes.type('xyrx')
G.axes.label(0,'Foo','Bar','Baz')
G.axes.label(1,'0','100')
G.axes.label(2,'A','B','C')
G.axes.style(0,'0000dd',14)
G.line(2)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y,r,x&chd=s:foobarbaz&chxs=0,0000dd,14&chco=76A4FB&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chxl=0:|Foo|Bar|Baz|1:|0|100|2:|A|B|C&chls=2.0&.png

=== Grid ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['foobarbaz'])
G.color('76A4FB')
G.axes.type('xy')
G.axes.label(0,*range(6))
G.axes.label(1,*[0,50,100])
G.line(3,6,3)
G.grid(20,25)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chd=s:foobarbaz&chg=20.0,25.0&chco=76A4FB&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chxl=0:|0|1|2|3|4|5|1:|0|50|100&chls=3.0,6.0,3.0&.png

=== Markers ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['helloWorld'])
G.marker('c','ff0000',0,1,20)
G.marker('d','00ff00',0,2,15)
G.marker('a','000099',0,3,10)
G.marker('R','A0BAE9',0,0.1,0.6)
G.marker('r','E5ECF9',0,0.75,0.25)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:helloWorld&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chm=c,ff0000,0,1,20|d,00ff00,0,2,15|a,000099,0,3,10|R,A0BAE9,0,0.1,0.6|r,E5ECF9,0,0.75,0.25&.png

=== Fill ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['99','cefhjkqwrlgYcfgc','QSSVXXdkfZUMRTUQ','HJJMOOUbVPKDHKLH','AA'])
G.marker('b','76A4FB',0,1,0)
G.marker('b','224499',1,2,0)
G.marker('b','FF0000',2,3,0)
G.marker('B','80C65A',3,4,0)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:99,cefhjkqwrlgYcfgc,QSSVXXdkfZUMRTUQ,HJJMOOUbVPKDHKLH,AA&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chm=b,76A4FB,0,1,0|b,224499,1,2,0|b,FF0000,2,3,0|B,80C65A,3,4,0&.png

=== Legend ===
{{{
G = GChart('lc',['FOETHECat','lkjtf3asv','KATYPSNXJ'])
G.color('ff0000','00ff00','0000ff')
G.legend('animals','vegetables','minerals')
G.title('My 20 questions')
G.axes.type('xy')
G.axes.label(0,'Oct','Nov','Dec')
G.axes.label(1,None,'20K','60K','100K')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chd=s:FOETHECat,lkjtf3asv,KATYPSNXJ&chco=ff0000,00ff00,0000ff&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chtt=My%2020%20questions&chxl=0:|Oct|Nov|Dec|1:||20K|60K|100K&chdl=animals|vegetables|minerals&.png
